name: Warped Destiny
description:
Warped Destiny is a Title being worked on currently and this release is the first Build after it's gone through bug fixes from the first round of outside testing. so everything seen in this build is subject to change and a lot of graphics may be seen as a placeholder. 

Warped Destiny is an action-adventure RPG game where the player is taken from his everyday life into a new world full of fascinating creatures strange monsters and a scared town. find out about your past, how you got here, and how to return home if there even is a way back. 

as you play through different dungeons and levels you'll unlock abilities to discover more of different areas and find more clues as to how to get home and who exactly brought you here. 

So far available for this version is the first dungeon, main town, and the forest area. more is planned to be added in the future.

(any feedback on the game is appreciated as again this build so far is the first text build V 0.2)
